data.title: Julia Roberts Net Worth in 2024
data.meta_description: Julia Roberts Net Worth by ALUX.COM. How much money does Julia Roberts have? How rich is Julia Roberts? How much is Julia Roberts Worth? Answers here!
data.text:
Julia Roberts Net Worth: How rich is Julia Roberts? & How much money is Julia Roberts worth? Time to find out!

Julia Roberts is an American actress and producer and her current net worth is $200 million.

Raised a Catholic in Smyrna, Georgia, Julia is the daughter of Betty Lou Bredemus and Walter Grady Roberts.

Eric Roberts, who is also an actor, is her brother, Lisa Roberts Gillan, also an actress, and her sister, Emma Roberts also an actress is her niece.

Since her parents divorced in early 1972 she kept living in Smyrna, Georgia, where she also went to school, and high school.

When she was a kid she dreamed about being a veterinarian, and she also knows how to play the clarinet, which she learned in the school band.

Right after she finished high school she attended Georgia State University, but this time didn’t graduate. She moved to New York City in search for a career in acting.

Not long after she arrived, she signed with the Click Modeling Agency and got herself into acting classes.

She is famous for her leading role in the romantic comedy Pretty Woman, a film that grossed $464 million worldwide in 1990.

Julia Roberts is also the winner of three Golden Globe Awards, and has four nominations for Academy Awards for her acting, and won one for the Best Actress for her role in Erin Brockovich.

Thanks to her films which have grossed billions in worldwide box office, she has been ranked among the most successful actresses in terms of box office receipts.

Between 2004 and 2008, Julia’s production company, Red Om Films, which she owns together with her sister, Lisa Roberts, and Marisa Yeres Gill, has been the executive producer of the first four films of the American Girl film series.

Apart from that, the actress was nominated eleven times in People magazine’s “50 Most Beautiful People in the World”.

She and her husband, cameraman Daniel Moder, which he met on the set of The Mexican in 2000, have three children together.

This wraps our Julia Roberts Net Worth profile!
